title: Code Quality: 3 Major Duplicate Files (18KB waste)
description: Medium technical debt: Three major duplicate files identified - Profile fix SQL files (EMERGENCY_FIX_PROFILES.sql vs fix-missing-profiles.sql 3KB), Google auth SQL (root vs migrations folder 1.8KB), Invoice migration (root vs migrations folder 13KB). Root cause: Emergency fixes created in root directory without cleaning up duplicates in migrations folder. Prevention: Establish file organization standards and cleanup procedures after emergency fixes.
